function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mixing of contaminated and clean air in hybrid ventilation systems","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and indoor air pollution","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of ventilation systems, use of air purification technologies","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV-C disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, especially in crowded spaces","Owner":"Building managers, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate separation of heat and contaminants in displacement ventilation systems","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality and discomfort for occupants","Mitigation":"Proper design and installation of displacement ventilation systems, regular monitoring of indoor air quality","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, advanced ventilation design software","People":"Occupants of the building","Owner":"Building designers, contractors"},{"Description":"Inefficient wind-driven ventilation leading to stagnant air and poor air quality","Impact":"Stagnant air and build-up of pollutants, reduced ventilation effectiveness","Mitigation":"Proper design of wind-driven ventilation systems, regular maintenance and monitoring","Technologies":"Wind simulation software, building airflow modeling tools","People":"Building occupants in spaces relying on wind-driven ventilation","Owner":"Building designers, maintenance staff"}]}
